claim: Mark Tedin is credited as the illustrator on the highest-mana-value single-faced card.
extra_info: doesn't have multiple faces refers to side IS NULL; illustrator refers to artist
reasoning: The highest-mana-value single-faced card (side IS NULL) is Gleemax with convertedManaCost of 1,000,000, and its artist is Richard Thomas, not Mark Tedin. The claim that Mark Tedin is the illustrator is therefore contradicted by the data.

    isOversized             INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isPromo                 INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isReprint               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isReserved              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isStarter               INTEGER default 0 not null,

    isTextless              INTEGER default 0 not null,

    keywords                TEXT,
    layout                  TEXT,
    leadershipSkills        TEXT,

    manaCost                TEXT,
    mcmId                   TEXT,
    mcmMetaId               TEXT,

    scryfallId              TEXT,
